title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Digital Technology-Enabled Instructional Design for High School Biology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design instructional materials explaining molecular genetics concepts using digital tools (e.g., virtual labs, simulation software).
Learners can apply strategic approaches to plan effective digital learning activities even in environments with limited technology.
Learners can develop teaching-learning models that convert microscopic/macroscopic phenomena in biology into digital representations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
